item.title: Union Pacific to Acquire Norfolk Southern for $72 Billion
item.description: Union Pacific agreed to acquire Norfolk Southern in a cash-and-stock transaction valuing the company at about $72 billion, forming a transcontinental rail behemoth in what stands to be the industry’s

item.title: Union Pacific to Acquire Norfolk Southern for $72 Billion
item.description: Union Pacific agreed to acquire Norfolk Southern in a cash-and-stock transaction valuing the company at about $72 billion, forming a transcontinental rail behemoth in what stands to be the industry’s

item.title: Union Pacific Is Said to Near Deal for Norfolk Southern
item.description: Union Pacific Corp. could reach an agreement to acquire Norfolk Southern Corp. and create a transcontinental rail behemoth as soon as early next week, people familiar with the matter said.
